mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FYP_Automatic_Grading.Teacher (id, name, email, department_code) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{email},#{department_code})
mapper.select: SELECT activation_code FROM FYP_Automatic_Grading.Teacher WHERE id = #{teacher_id}
SELECT is_activated FROM FYP_Automatic_Grading.Teacher WHERE id = #{t_id}
SELECT salt FROM FYP_Automatic_Grading.Teacher WHERE id = #{t_id}
SELECT m.code, m.name, t.id, t.name as teacher_name, t.email FROM FYP_Automatic_Grading.Teacher AS t, FYP_Automatic_Grading.Module AS m WHERE t.id = m.teacher_id

SELECT t.department_code, d.name as department_name, t.id, t.name, t.email FROM FYP_Automatic_Grading.Teacher AS t, FYP_Automatic_Grading.Department AS d WHERE t.department_code = d.code AND t.is_activated = 1
